newsitem.title: USA: Singer Melissa Etheridge's lover has baby.
newsitem.headline: Singer Melissa Etheridge's lover has baby.

text.p: The lesbian lover of rock singer Melissa Etheridge gave birth on Monday to a baby daughter, a spokeswoman for Etheridge said.
The eight-pound, 10-ounce girl named Bailey Jean was born in Los Angeles to Julie Cypher, ex-wife of actor Lou Diamond Phillips, said Gayle Fine, a spokeswoman for Etheridge in New York.
"Everybody is doing great," Fine said in a statement.
Etheridge, known for a hard-driving guitar rock style and the hit song "Come to My Window," and Cypher have been together for eight years. They live in Los Angeles.
The fertilisation method and information about the sperm donor were not disclosed.
Etheridge has said in newspaper interviews she and Cypher, a filmmaker, would like to have three children.
